data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: Pore Engineering for One-Step Ethylene Purification from a Three-Component Hydrocarbon Mixture

data.question: Who are the authors of the article?
data.answer: Baoyong Zhu, Jian-Wei Cao, Soumya Mukherjee, Tony Pham, Tao Zhang, Teng Wang, Xue Jiang, Katherine A. Forrest, Michael J. Zaworotko, and Kai-Jie Chen

data.question: What is the main focus of the article?
data.answer: The article focuses on the synthesis of three new isostructural porous coordination networks (NPU-1, NPU-2, NPU-3) for selective adsorption of C2H2 and C2H6 over C2H4.

data.question: What are the names of the three new isostructural porous coordination networks reported?
What is the composition of the hexanuclear metal cluster used in the synthesis of NPU-1/2/3?
What is the purity of ethylene produced by NPU-1 from a three-component gas mixture?
Which NPU material demonstrated the ability to produce polymer-grade ethylene in a single separation step?
True or False: NPU-2 and NPU-3 have the same pore size.
What method was used to calculate the adsorption selectivity of C2H2/C2H4 and C2H6/C2H4?
True or False: The adsorption selectivity values for C2H2/C2H4 and C2H6/C2H4 were found to be higher for NPU-3 compared to NPU-1 and NPU-2.
What is the role of the hexanuclear Mn cluster in the structure of NPU-1/2/3?
data.answer: It serves as a 9-connected node for the construction of the porous coordination networks.

data.question: True or False: NPU-1/2/3 exhibit a dual cage structure.
What technique was used for the structural determination of NPU-1/2/3?
True or False: The adsorption enthalpy for C2H2 is higher than for C2H4 in NPU-1.
What is the significance of the pore size variation in NPU-1/2/3?
data.answer: The variation in pore size allows for systematic fine-tuning of cage size to realize selective adsorption of C2H2 and C2H6 over C2H4.

data.question: True or False: Molecular simulations were performed to understand the nature of the binding sites for C2H2, C2H4, and C2H6 in NPU-1.
What is the topology of NPU-1/2/3?
True or False: NPU-1 has the highest BET surface area among NPU-1/2/3.
What is the main advantage of using NPU-1 for ethylene purification?
data.answer: NPU-1 enables the production of polymer-grade ethylene from a three-component gas mixture in a single separation step with high purity.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis conditions for NPU-1/2/3 were identical except for the dicarboxylic acid ligand used.
